Query: How to start firefox in fullscreen mode?

Answers.MP Summary: a free and open source web browser from Mozilla
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Launch Firefox in safe mode, with all extensions disabled
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_487936: How Do I Open Fixed Window In Firefox (like Chrome app mode)?
au_185304: Firefox starts in small window
Top-3 Scripts:
so_52210105: # Call Firefox and set to window position on its process
Start-Process -FilePath 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe'
Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
Set-Window -ProcessName firefox -x 1 -y 1 -Width 615 -Height 345 -Passthru

Explanations about Options.-a: Specify arguments to pass to the debugger. Used in conjunction with -g.
Explanations about Options.-d:
Specify the debugger in which to start firefox. The default is gdb. Used in
 conjunction with -g.
Explanations about Options.-P:
Start firefox with the profile named profile. Will start the profile manager if a
 valid profile name is not specified. You will need to also use -no-remote if there
 is already a running firefox instance.
